nodes.bodyText:
This seems to not be true anymore. Starting 1.8.0u252, ALPN is supported.
(see https://www.eclipse.org/jetty/documentation/current/alpn-chapter.html#alpn-versions)
oh interesting... Didn't know this was backported.
So, the jdkAlpnSupported method should be updated to handle this "new feature".
@cescoffier working on a PR as we speak
